data.title: 25 Awards for Students Grades K
data.meta_description: Use these printable awards for students to recognize effort, achievement, and progress. Awards for academics, good behavior, personality, and attitude.
data.text:
Homework Pass

This pass entitles a student to one homework-free evening at home. It can be used as an incentive for your students to work hard in class and earn high grades.

Free Computer Time Award

Reward children with free computer time during class. This is a great reward for your students to work towards in class.

Make Gift Certificates

Sometimes the best present is the one that doesn't cost a thing. Encourage your students to be creative in their gift-giving with these printable gift certificates.

Star Performance Award

At the end of the school year, customize this printable as a graduation award: "Congratulations on your star performance in second grade."

Graduation Note: "Owl" Always Remember You

This creative award congratulates students on graduating to the next grade or finishing a learning program with a cute note that says, "Congratulations Graduate! 'Owl' always remember you. Have a great summer!".

Graduation Certificate This customizable and printable certificate is perfect for all grades and graduations from Kindergarten through High School.

Ecology Badges

Reward students for their efforts to save the Earth with these badges. Challenge them to see how many badges they can collect.

Ecology: Wrist Awards

Use these wrist badges to award students for participating in a unit on the environment.

Friendship Badges

Use these badges in a unit on friendship, to award students for participation.

Thank-You Certificate

Present this certificate to the most deserving student and express your gratitude. This printable is customizable. Tailor the PDF to your teaching needs by typing in the highlighted fields before printing.

Star Performer Certificate

Reward your students for outstanding work. This printable is customizable. Tailor the PDF to your needs by typing in the highlighted fields before printing. This can be used for math, writing, or more.

Good News Notes

Recognize progress or reward outstanding work with these good news notes. They're a positive way to communicate with parents, plus they'll help foster students' self-confidence. Each printable note is customizable. Tailor the PDF to your needs by typing in the highlighted fields before printing.

Herpetology Bookmarks and Awards

Reward your students' literacy with this reading award. This printable is customizable. Tailor the PDF to your needs by typing in the highlighted fields before printing.

Curious George Gets a Medal: Certificate & Medal

After reading Curious George Gets a Medal, use this printable activity to acknowledge another deserving book character or person who deserves recognition. Children can write about the recipient and design a medal for them.
